## 🚀 Tech Stack  
- **Frontend:** React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript  
- **Backend:** Node.js, Spring Boot, Express.js  
- **Database:** MySQL, MongoDB  
- **Tools:** Git, Docker, Postman
